statements: DELETE FROM compliance WHERE substance_name = 'H2O' AND compliance_status = 'Approved'
DELETE FROM Distribution WHERE distributor_id = 1 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Substance WHERE type = 'Prescription' AND legal_status = 'Controlled';
DELETE FROM controlled_substances WHERE distribution_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM distribution_centers WHERE name = 'Center A';
DELETE FROM inspections WHERE compliance_status = false AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE distribution_center_id = 3 AND shipment_date >= '2021-10-01';
